video.title: Inspector Gadget
video.synopsis: Inspector Gadget is back and must face his old enemy, the evil Dr. Claw, who has reactivated M.A.D., his global crime syndicate.

episodes.synopsis: Dr. Claw returns from the Antarctic, drawing Inspector Gadget out of retirement; Penny and Gadget race to find Dr. Claw's claw before he does.
episodes.title: Gadget 2.0: Part 1 / Gadget 2.0: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Dr. Claw plots to take over every satellite in the sky; astronauts are vanishing from the Multinational Space Station, and Gadget must find out why.
episodes.title: Towering Towers / Game Over Man

episodes.synopsis: Gadget provides security for a pop star whose army of fans proves an attractive target for Dr. Claw; Gadget protects an invention from MAD thieves.
episodes.title: Rock Out / Strike a Pose

episodes.synopsis: Gadget, Penny and Brain investigate the disappearance of a movie star; when Gadget catches the flu, Penny and Brain must track down a super villain.
episodes.title: A Better Class of MAD / Cough Due to Claw

episodes.synopsis: Brain and Penny go undercover at the Dog & Boney show; Gadget, Penny and Brain visit an apple farm where MAD is growing a race of mutant fruits.
episodes.title: Dog Show Days Are Over / One Bad Apple

episodes.synopsis: Gadget and crew infiltrate a vacuum cleaner convention; Talon tries to prove himself to his uncle by attempting to steal Dr. Claw's training claw.
episodes.title: Sucks Like MAD / A Claw for Talon

episodes.synopsis: Gadget ingests a device that is due to explode; Penny goes to a MAD training convention, where Gadget stumbles into an anger management seminar.
episodes.title: Gadget's Da Bomb / Gadget Management

episodes.synopsis: Gadget, Penny and Brain search for the Lost City of Diamonds; Dr. Claw hires a cuckoo clockmaker to freeze time at a conference in St. Moritz.
episodes.title: Diamonds Are a MAD's Best Friend / Ticked Off

episodes.synopsis: Gadget, Penny and Brain travel the to Canadian Arctic to visit a town of happy Gadget fans; MAD stages a high school reunion for Gadget and his pals.
episodes.title: You Know the Drill / Spy School Reunion

episodes.synopsis: Dr. Claw and his mother devise a donut recipe meant to put the world into a stupor; Dr. Claw uses an evil magician to transform people into henchmen.
episodes.title: A Hole in One / Operation Hocus Pocus

episodes.synopsis: Dr. Claw wants to steal a futuristic UltraBlimp; Dr. Claw gets everyone so addicted to a mobile game that they will perform evil acts to win MADcoins.
episodes.title: MAD Carpet Ride / Appy Days

episodes.synopsis: Dr. Claw plans to destroy Gadget with a device that causes Penny to keep reliving the same bad day; Gadget, Penny and Brain go on a Kenyan safari.
episodes.title: Collider Scope / She Got Dangerous Game

episodes.synopsis: MAD and HQ race to get control of Dr. Claw's dangerous -- and sunken -- submarine; Inspector Gadget goes undercover as a wrestler and fights to win.
episodes.title: My Gadget Will Go On / The Gadgetator

episodes.synopsis: Penny accidentally awakens a race of automatons buried beneath Easter Island's giant heads; Gadget and Penny enter a prestigious car race.
episodes.title: Head Case / Start Your Gadgets

episodes.synopsis: The crew searches a Tibetan monastery for the Helmet of Thought, which gives the wearer incredible mental powers; Talon hijacks an ultramodern train.
episodes.title: Mind Over MADder / Train-ing Day

episodes.synopsis: Dr. Claw plans to use radio waves to melt the polar ice caps; Dr. Claw plots against a party where he was snubbed, dousing it in water from Loch Ness.
episodes.title: Ice, Ice Yeti / MAD Soaker

episodes.synopsis: The gang hunts for a missing archeologist who vanished near the Fountain of Youth; Dr. Claw is invited to deliver a speech at Villain University.
episodes.title: The Fountain of Cortez / Evil U

episodes.synopsis: Brain gets a dose of MAD's new serum and turns into a werewolf, hunting down Gadget and Penny in London; Talon fills in for the vacationing Dr. Claw.
episodes.title: WereBrain of London / Airhead to the Throne

episodes.synopsis: Talon and Penny each find half of a map to the lost city of Atlantis, where they must meet Gadget; Dr. Claw steals the largest penny in the world.
episodes.title: Lost in the Lost City of Atlantis / A Penny Saved

episodes.synopsis: In order to break into HQ, MAD creates an evil clone of Penny; Gadget signs up for a dating site and is matched with Sue Donym, an agent of MAD.
episodes.title: Double O'Penny / We Heart Gadget

episodes.synopsis: Talon shrinks himself in order to steal HQ's passcodes -- and a soup recipe; Dr. Claw creates a device to turn off all the world's electronic gadgets.
episodes.title: Tiny Talon Time / Fellowsheep of the Ring

episodes.synopsis: Dr. Claw sends MADtana Dan to trigger a volcanic eruption in Hawaii; Dr. Claw tries to shut down Broadway by producing the worst show ever staged.
episodes.title: A Clawruption / Forever MAD

episodes.synopsis: Gadget and his crew go to Australia to prevent Talon from carving Claw's face into Ayers Rock; MAD uses a device to switch Brain and MADcat's bodies.
episodes.title: Beyond Gadgetdome / Brain Drain

episodes.synopsis: Using his superior coding skills, Talon traps Gadget, Penny and Brain in the MADtrix; Gadget's team competes on a Japanese game show hosted by MADcat.
episodes.title: What Is… the MADtrix / Most Extreme Gadget Challenge

episodes.synopsis: Gadget's crew dodges mummies to stop Dr. Claw from sinking the Pyramid of Giza; the gang time travels to turn Dr. Claw good before evil can take hold.
episodes.title: Pyramid Scheme / Back to the MAD Future

episodes.synopsis: The crew meets their Russian counterparts while in Russia to stop Talon from stealing ice blocks; Talon plants a freezing device on the Gadget-bus.
episodes.title: Tool Russia, With Love / Low Speed
